scripts.prepare:rinkeby: node ./sync-with-last-deploy.js rinkeby V2 && mustache config/rinkeby.json src/subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:local: node ./sync-with-last-deploy.js localhost V2 && mustache config/localhost.json src/subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ corantin/quests-subgraph
